name: Roasted Asparagus with Parmesan
ingredients: oil,1 pound fresh asparagus,¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese,1 tsp sea salt,¼ tsp garlic powder
recipe: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray the inside of a 9x13 casserole dish with olive oil cooking spray. Place asparagus in the dish and lightly spray spears with cooking spray
Sprinkle asparagus with Parmesan cheese, sea salt, and garlic powder
Roast in preheated oven until fork easily punctures thickest part of stem, about 12 minutes

name: Crunchy Lemon Quinoa Asparagus
ingredients: 1 pound of asparagus,1 cup of cooked red quinoa ,2 tsp of oil,½white onion,2 garlic cloves,½ cup of low sodium vegetable
recipe: Bring a medium sized saute pan filled halfway with water to a boil, and blanch the asparagus for 23 minutes until tender, but still crispy. Once cooked rinse with cold water to stop it from further cooking, and set aside
Heat the coconut oil in a large saute pan, add the diced onion and garlic and cook until translucent.
Transfer the cooked quinoa, vegetable stock, and seasonings to the saute pan and cook for about 56 minutes.
Add the cooked asparagus and nutritional yeast, and cook for another 34 minutes.
Serve and garnish with more nutritional yeast, or a seasoning of your choice (Parmesan cheese if you wish).

name: grilled asian asparagus
ingredients: 1 pound fresh asparagus trimmed,½ cup hoisin sauce,sesame seeds
recipe: Place asparagus and hoisin sauce into a resealable plastic bag and shake several times to coat asparagus with sauce. Allow to stand at least 30 minutes. For best flavor, refrigerate and marinate overnight.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.

Remove asparagus from bag and shake off excess hoisin sauce; lay asparagus spears onto the grill and cook, turning every 1 to 2 minutes, until all sides of the spears show grill marks and hoisin sauce has caramelized onto the asparagus, 4 to 6 minutes.
Transfer asparagus to a serving platter and sprinkle with sesame seeds to serve.

name: pasta chicken asparagus
ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast ,1 pinch salt, 1 pound penne pasta,2 tbsp butter,¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2  tbsp olive oil ,1 pound asparagus,1 pinch garlic salt
recipe: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Cover a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
Spread the chicken breast tenderloins on the baking sheet and sprinkle with garlic salt and seasoned salt.
Bake chicken in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes. Set aside; when cool enough to handle, cut tenderloins into bitesize pieces.

Fill a large pot with lightly salted water, bring to a boil, and stir in penne. Cook pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until penne are cooked through but still slightly firm, about 11 minutes; drain.
Transfer penne back to cooking pot and stir in butter and Parmesan cheese until pasta is coated.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; place asparagus into the hot oil and sprinkle with garlic salt. Cook and stir until asparagus are tender, about 7 minutes.
Transfer penne pasta into a large serving bowl and top with asparagus and chicken tenderloin pieces. Lightly mix asparagus and chicken into the pasta to serve.

name: roasted asparagus with mushroom
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh asparagus trimmed,½ pound fresh mushrooms quartered,2 sprigs fresh rosemary minced,2 tsp olive oil, kosher salt to taste,freshly ground black pepper to taste
recipe: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly spray a cookie sheet with vegetable cooking spray.

Place the asparagus and mushrooms in a bowl. Drizzle with the olive oil, then season with rosemary, salt, and pepper; toss well. Lay the asparagus and mushrooms out on the prepared pan in an even layer. Roast in the preheated oven until the asparagus is tender, about 15 minutes.

name: sauteed asparagus
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh asparagus,2  tbsp extravirgin olive oil, ¼ cup water, ⅛  tsp salt, ⅛  tsp pepper
recipe: Drizzle olive oil into a large skillet over mediumhigh heat and heat. Once oil is hot add asparagus spears; cover and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add water and cover to steam asparagus and keep it from drying out. Continue cooking for another 5 minutes or until asparagus is tender. Season with salt and pepper.

name: shrimp quinoa with asparagus
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa,1½ cups chicken broth,2 tbsp olive oil,3 cloves garlic,1 onion,1 red bell pepper,8 spears asparagus,1 cup fresh mushrooms,¼ cup raisins,1 tbsp fresh ginger root,1 pound uncooked shrimp,1 tbsp lemon juice,salt to taste
recipe: Bring the quinoa and chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender about 15 minutes. Turn off the heat, and let the remaining liquid absorb into the quinoa.

Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the garlic, onion, and red bell pepper; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the asparagus, mushrooms, raisins, and ginger; continue cooking until the asparagus is tender. Stir in the shrimp, and cook until the shrimp have turned pink and are no longer translucent in the center.
Stir the lemon juice into the quinoa, then toss the quinoa with the shrimp and vegetable mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving.

name: steamed asparagus
ingredients: 1 pound asparagus ,¼ cup white wine,2 tbsp butter
recipe: Place asparagus in a microwavesafe dish. Pour in wine, and dot with pieces of butter.
Cover loosely, and cook in the microwave on High for 3 minutes, or until bright green and tender. Allow the dish to stand 5 minutes before serving.

name: superfast asparagus
ingredients: 1 pound asparagus ,1 tsp Cajun seasoning
recipe: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Snap the asparagus at the tender part of the stalk. Arrange spears in one layer on a baking sheet. Spray lightly with nonstick spray; sprinkle with the Cajun seasoning.
Bake in the preheated oven until tender, about 10 minutes

name: awsome broccoli cheese
ingredients: ½ cup butter ,1 onion, chopped,1 pkg frozen chopped broccoli,4 cans chicken broth,1 loaf processed cheese food,1 tbsp garlic powder,⅔ cup cornstarch,1 cup water
recipe: In a stockpot, melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion in butter until softened. Stir in broccoli, and cover with chicken broth. Simmer until broccoli is tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
Reduce heat, and stir in cheese cubes until melted. Mix in milk and garlic powder.
In a small bowl, stir cornstarch into water until dissolved. Stir into soup; cook, stirring frequently, until thick.

name: cavatelli and broccoli
ingredients: 3 heads fresh broccoli cut into florets ,½ cup olive oil,3 cloves garlic minced, 1½ pounds cavatelli pasta,1  tsp salt,1  tsp crushed red pepper flakes ,2  tbsp grated Parmesan cheese
recipe: In a large pot of boiling water, blanch broccoli for about 5 minutes. Drain, and set aside.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute garlic until lightly golden, being careful not to burn it. Add the broccoli. Saute, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes. Broccoli should be tender yet crisp to the bite.

Meanwhile, cook cavatelli in a large pot of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente. Drain, and place in a large serving bowl. Toss with the broccoli, and season with salt and hot pepper flakes. Serve with parmesan cheese.

name: chicken and broccoli cauli rice
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken,½ cup sliced red onion,1 pkg Knorr Rice Sides,salt as required
recipe: Melt Spread in large nonstick skillet over mediumhigh heat and cook chicken and onion, stirring frequently, until chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 4 minutes. Remove and set aside.
Prepare Knorr® Rice Sides™  Creamy Chicken flavor in same skillet according to pkg directions, stirring in broccoli during the last 5 minutes of cook time.
Stir in chicken and onion. Sprinkle with bacon.

name: Easy broccoli quinoa soup
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil,½ onion diced ,2 cloves garlic minced,2 cups broccoli florets,2 cups water,1 cup quinoa,2 cubes chicken bouillon,1 can fatfree milk,1 tbsp allpurpose flour
recipe: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes. Add broccoli, water, quinoa, and chicken bouillon cubes to the onion mixture; bring to a boil stirring to dissolve the bouillon cubes. Place a cover on the skillet, reduce heat to low, and simmer until quinoa is fluffy, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir evaporated milk and flour into the quinoa. Increase heat and bring the mixture to a boil; cook and stir until the mixture thickens, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to serve.

name: Ginger veggie stir fry
ingredients: 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1½ cloves garlic,2 tsp ginger ,¼ cup vegetable oil ,½ cup snow peas,¾ cup carrots,½ cup green beans,2 tbsp soy sauce,¼ cup chopped onion
recipe: In a large bowl, blend cornstarch, garlic, 1  tsp ginger, and 2  tbsp vegetable oil until cornstarch is dissolved. Mix in broccoli, snow peas, carrots, and green beans, tossing to lightly coat.

Heat remaining 2  tbsp oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Cook vegetables in oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly to prevent burning. Stir in soy sauce and water. Mix in onion, salt, and remaining 1  tsp ginger. Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.

name: Keto shrimp scampi with broccoli noodles
ingredients: 2 broccoli,2  tbsp olive oil,salt,ground black pepper,2 cloves garlic minced,1 pound raw shrimp,2 tbsp dry white wine,2 tbsp lemon juice,1 tbsp minced basil,½ tsp crushed red pepper
recipe: Cut off broccoli florets and save for another use. Cut woody ends off the stems. Shave large knots off the stems using a vegetable peeler so that they are as uniform as possible. Cut into noodles using the smallest blade on a spiralizer.
Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over mediumhigh heat. Add broccoli noodles, salt, and pepper; toss for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Heat remaining olive oil and garlic in a separate skillet over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add shrimp and cook until opaque, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer shrimp to a bowl.
Add wine, lemon juice, butter, basil, chives, and red pepper to the skillet. Whisk over medium heat for 3 minutes. Return shrimp to the skillet and toss to coat.
Spoon broccoli noodles into 4 serving bowls. Top with shrimp mixture.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/keto shrimp scampi with broccoli noodles.jpg

name: Low carb cream of broccoli soup
ingredients: tsp onion powder, tsp garlic powder, tsp paprika, tbsp butter,ounces cream cheese,cups chicken broth,cup heavy whipping cream,ounces frozen chopped broccoli,cup sharp cheddar cheese
recipe: Add butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, onion powder & paprika to a large pot over medium heat. Stir frequently until melted and blended together.
Add heavy cream and chicken broth, stir to combine. Bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring occasionally. Once boiling allow to boil 58 minutes.
Add broccoli, stir and return to a boil. Once boiling reduce to simmer and cover. Cook for an additional 20 minutes.
Remove from heat, add cheddar, salt and pepper to taste. Stir and Serve.
This makes 6  1 cup servings at 4.1 net carbs.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/low carb cream of broccoli soup.jpg

name: Roasted garlic lemon broccoli
ingredients: 2 heads broccoli separated into florets,2  tsp extravirgin olive oil, 1  tsp sea salt,½  tsp ground black pepper,1 clove garlic minced,½  tsp lemon juice
recipe: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large bowl, toss broccoli florets with the extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, pepper and garlic. Spread the broccoli out in an even layer on a baking sheet.

Bake in the preheated oven until florets are tender enough to pierce the stems with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove and transfer to a serving platter. Squeeze lemon juice liberally over the broccoli before serving for a refreshing, tangy finish.

name: Skillet quinoa salad
ingredients: 1  tsp extravirgin olive oil,1 cup quinoa rinsed and drained,2 cups lowsodium chicken broth,1 head broccoli cut into small florets,½ bunch kale chopped,½ red bell pepper chopped,¼ cup fresh cilantro chopped,¼ cup sliced black olives,salt and ground black pepper to taste,1 tbsp extravirgin olive oil or to taste
recipe: Heat 1  tsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add quinoa; cook and stir until quinoa is lightly toasted, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Pour in chicken broth slowly. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until most of the chicken broth is absorbed, about 12 minutes.

Layer broccoli, kale, and red bell pepper over quinoa in the skillet. Cover and cook until quinoa is tender, about 8 minutes more. Fluff quinoa with a fork. Sprinkle cilantro and olives on top. Season with salt and black pepper and drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil.

name: Kerala Beef Curry
ingredients: 2 lb beef,2 tablespoon coconut oil,3 onion chopped,3 tomatoes diced,1 green chili sliced,8 clove garlic minced,1-inch piece ginger minced,curry leaves,1 tablespoon chili powder,2 tablespoon coriander powder,1 teaspoon garam masala,1 cup water,Salt and pepper to taste
recipe: Heat coconut oil in a pressure cooker (or Instant Pot) over medium heat. Add in onion and salt. Cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and green chili. Saute until the tomatoes become soft and juicy. Then add in garlic, ginger, and curry leaves and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Add in the beef, followed by chili powder, coriander powder, black pepper, and garam masala. Mix well to combine. Add in water.

Close the lid of the pressure cooker and cook for 20 to 30 minutes (4 to 6 whistles) or until beef is thoroughly cooked through. Allow the pressure to release completely before opening the pressure cooker.

name: Beef Cutlet
ingredients: Ground beef,onion,green chilli,curry leaves,turmeric powder,garlic,fennel powder,pepper powder,garam masala,potato
recipe: Chop onion into small pieces. Crush green chillies in a chopper or mixer. Heat oil in a pan. When oil is hot, add the sliced onions, curry leaves, and salt. Adding salt helps the onion to get cooked fast.
While it gets sauteed, cook potatoes in a separate pan or cooker. If you are using the cooker, switch it off after 2 whistles or until it is done.
Crush or grind ginger and garlic. Once onion turns light brown, add gingergarlic mixture to it. Once it is sauteed well, add fennel powder, pepper powder and garam masala.

Saute it for a couple of minutes and then add cleaned ground beef. Cook it until beef is done. Ground beef gets cooked soon. It might just take around 10 to 15 minutes. Saute it well and make it dry. Refer notes if you don't want to use ground beef.
To fry  Make round balls and roll it into oval or other desired shapes. Beat egg well. Dip each cutlet in egg and then roll it in bread crumbs.

name: Slow cooker broccoli beef
ingredients: 1 beef bouillon cube,1 cup warm water,½ cup soy sauce,⅓ cup brown sugar,2 cloves garlic minced,1 tbsp sesame oil,1 tbsp sesame oil,2 tbsp cornstarch,2 pounds broccoli florets,2 cups cooked jasmine rice
recipe: Crumble beef bouillon cube into warm water in a bowl and stir to dissolve; add soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, and sesame oil and stir to dissolve sugar.
Put beef strips into a slow cooker crock. Pour sauce mixture over the beef.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours
Spoon 2  tbsp liquid from the slow cooker into a bowl. Whisk cornstarch into the liquid and stir the cornstarch mixture into the liquid in the slow cooker until consistent in color.
Cook on High until the sauce thickens, about 30 minutes.
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil.
Cook broccoli in covered steamer until tender, 2 to 6 minutes; add to sauce in slow cooker and stir to coat.
Ladle broccoli beef over portions of cooked jasmine rice and garnish with sesame seeds.

name: Cabbage beef soup
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil,1 pound ground beef,½ large onion chopped,5 cups chopped cabbage,2 cans red kidney beans drained,2 cups water,24 ounces tomato sauce,4 beef bouillon cubes,1½  tsp ground cumin,1  tsp salt,1  tsp pepper
recipe: Heat oil in a large stockpot over medium high heat. Add ground beef and onion, and cook until beef is well browned and crumbled. Drain fat, and transfer beef to a slow cooker. Add cabbage, kidney beans, water, tomato sauce, bouillon, cumin, salt, and pepper. Stir to dissolve bouillon, and cover.
Cook on high setting for 4 hours, or on low setting for 6 to 8 hours. Stir occasionally. Enjoy

name: Cabbage fat burning soup
ingredients: 5 carrots chopped,3 onions chopped,2 tomatoes with liquid,1 large cabbage ,onion soup mix,1 can green beans ,2 quarts tomato juice,2 green bell peppers ,10 stalks celery
recipe: Place carrots, onions, tomatoes, cabbage, green beans, peppers, and celery in a large pot. Add onion soup mix, tomato juice, beef broth, and enough water to cover vegetables. Simmer until vegetables are tender. May be stored in the refrigerator for several days.

name: Cabbage rolls
ingredients: 2 cups uncooked longgrain rice,4 cups water, 2 large heads savoy cabbage,1 cup water,2 onions chopped,3  tbsp butter,1 pound extralean ground beef,½ pound pork sausage,2  tsp dried dill weed,¾  tsp salt,½  tsp ground black pepper,1 can whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid,8 bay leaves
recipe: Wash rice thoroughly. In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups rice and 4 cups water. Bring to boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until all of the water is absorbed.

In the meantime, remove the core from the cabbages using a thin, long knife. Place 1 cabbage in a microwave proof container with a lid with core side down. Pour ½ cup water into the container with the cabbage, cover and microwave on HIGH (full power) for 10 minutes. Carefully turn cabbage over and cook covered for an additional 10 minutes. When cabbage is cooked, let sit until it is cool enough to handle. Separate leaves carefully, removing any tough ribs. Cook the second cabbage in the same manner.

Divide chopped onions in half. Saute one half of the onions in 3  tbsp butter; cook just until translucent (do not brown). In a large mixing bowl, mix together both the cooked and uncooked rice, cooked and uncooked onions, ground beef, pork sausage, garlic, dill weed, salt, black pepper and sugar and mix well to blend.
Spoon about 2  tbsp of mixture onto each cabbage leaf. Bring one end of cabbage leaf over mixture, roll and tuck ends in to prevent any filling from falling out.

In a food processor or blender, process condensed tomato soup and tomatoes. Pour tomato mixture over the cabbage rolls until just covered. Place 4 bay leaves on top of sauce in each dish. Cover each dish tightly with aluminum foil.
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 2 hours. Once cooked, remove the dishes from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before removing aluminum foil. Serve hot

name: Creamed cabbage
ingredients: ¼ cup butter,4 slices bacon,1 tbsp allpurpose flour,1  tsp salt,1 cabbage ,½ cup sour cream
recipe: Place the bacon in a large, deep skillet, and cook over mediumhigh heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove the bacon slices to cool.

Whisk the butter, flour, and salt into the drippings in the same pan. Stir in the cabbage, and cook, stirring occasionally, over medium heat until cabbage is tender, about 15 minutes. Crumble the bacon; stir the bacon pieces and sour cream into the cabbage mixture.

name: Easy apple coleslaw
ingredients: 3 cups chopped cabbage,1 red apple,1 Granny Smith apple,1 carrot grated ,½ cup chopped red bell pepper,2 green onions,⅓ cup mayonnaise,⅓ cup brown sugar,1 tbsp lemon juice
recipe: In a large bowl, combine cabbage, red apple, green apple, carrot, red bell pepper, and green onions. In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, brown sugar, and lemon juice. Pour dressing over salad.

name: French Fries
ingredients: 4 large potatos,cold water (for rinsing),oil (for frying),½ tsp chilli powder,½ tsp oregano,½ tsp salt
recipe: Firstly, peel the skin of potato. recommend using maris piper potatoes as they have creamy white flesh and fluffy texture.
cut into 1 cm thick sticks.
rinse in ice cold water until the starch runs out clean.
Pat dry in kitchen towel to remove excess moisture.
Now deep fry in hot oil. make sure the oil is approximately 140 degree celcius.
Deep fry for 6 minutes or until the potatoes turn tender.They will not go brown at this stage and transfer it in plate
Once they are cooled completely, deep fry in hot oil
Now sprinkle ½ tsp chilli powder,oregano and salt.

name: Easy corned beef and cabbage
ingredients: 1 onion,4 potatoes,1 pound carrots,3 cups water,1 bay leaf,1 corned beef,1 small cabbage
recipe: Place onion, potatoes, and carrots in a 5quart slow cooker. Combine water, garlic, bay leaf, sugar, vinegar, and contents of spice packet in a small bowl; pour over vegetables. Top with brisket and cabbage.
Cover and cook on Low until meat and vegetables are tender, 8 to 9 hours. Remove bay leaf before serving.

name: Fish tacos
ingredients: 1 lime juiced,¼ cup olive oil,¼ cup chopped cilantro,1 jalapeno pepper diced,1 tbsp ground ancho chile powder,¼  tsp ground cumin,salt and ground black pepper to taste,½ pound halibut fillets,8 corn tortillas
recipe: Stir lime juice, olive oil, cilantro, jalapeno, chile powder, cumin, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl or resealable ziptop bag. Add halibut and marinate for 20 to 25 minutes. Do not overmarinate, as lime juice will start to cook the fish
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate. Drain marinade; grill fillets for 5 minutes. Turn and cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 2 minutes more.
Warm tortillas on the grill or stove. Divide halibut among tortillas and top with cabbage, salsa, pepper Jack cheese, and avocado.

name: Healing cabbage soup
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,½ onion chopped,2 cloves garlic chopped,2 quarts water,4 tsp chicken bouillon granules,1 tsp salt,½  tsp black pepper,½ head cabbage,1 can stewed tomatoes
recipe: In a large stockpot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Stir in onion and garlic; cook until onion is transparent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in water, bouillon, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then stir in cabbage. Simmer until cabbage wilts, about 10 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes. Return to a boil, then simmer 15 to 30 minutes, stirring often.

name: Low calorie vegetarian filipino
ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes,3 cups water,1 can kidney beans drained,1 can red beans drained,1 yellow onion diced,½ yellow bell pepper diced,½ orange bell pepper diced,3  tbsp chilli powder,2  tbsp garlic powder,2 pinches salt
recipe: Combine diced tomatoes, water, kidney beans, red beans, onion, tomato paste, mushrooms, yellow bell pepper, orange bell pepper, chilli powder, garlic powder, and salt in a large saucepan over high heat. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer, stirring occasionally, until all vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes.

name: pad thai quinoa bowl
ingredients: 4 cups chicken broth,2 cups quinoa,1 tbsp oil,1 chicken breast,¾ cup shredded cabbage,½ cup edamame,¼ cup diced broccoli ,2 carrots,2 green onions chopped,3 eggs,1 tsp sesame oil
recipe: Bring chicken broth and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Set aside.

Heat 1 ½  tsp coconut oil in a wok or large skillet over mediumhigh heat. Add chicken; stir until cooked through; about 5 minutes. Remove chicken from wok. Heat remaining 1 ½  tsp coconut oil. Add cabbage, edamame, broccoli, carrot, and green onions and saute until vegetables soften slightly, 2 to 3 minutes.
Whisk eggs with sesame oil in a small bowl. Push vegetables to the sides of the wok to make a well in the center; pour eggs in and stir to scramble, about 3 minutes.
Combine peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, chilli garlic sauce, ginger, garlic, and sesame oil together in a small bowl. Pour Thai peanut sauce over vegetable and egg mixture in the wok.
Return chicken to the wok and add quinoa; mix well to combine. Stir in chopped peanuts and cilantro and serve.

name: Creamy Keto Cucumber Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber,2 tbsp of mayo ,2 tbsp lemon juice
recipe: To make the creamy cucumber salad, mix together (in a small bowl) the cucumber slices, mayo, and lemon juice.  Add salt and pepper to taste.

name: Chilled Cucumber and Prawn Soup
ingredients: 1 cucumber,125g prawns,300 ml yogurt,6 tbsp lemon juice,250 ml cream,1 capsicum
recipe: Sprinkle salt on the grated cucumber and leave aside for 15 minutes.
Mix together the yoghurt, cream and cucumber.
Add lemon juice, capsicum prawns and salt and pepper.
Chill for an hour before serving.

name: Creamy Dill Cucumber Toastie
ingredients: 1 pkg cream cheese,1 pkg dry salad mix,½ cup mayonnaise,1 French baguette,1 cucumber,2 tsp dried dill weed
recipe: In a medium bowl, mix together cream cheese, dressing mix and mayonnaise.
Spread a thin layer of the cream cheese mixture on a slice of bread, and top with a slice of cucumber. Sprinkle with dill. Repeat with remaining ingredients.

name: kannur tomato pachadi
ingredients: 5 tomatoes,½ bunch corriander leaves,1tsp chilli power,4 chillies,1 tbsp mustard seeds, 1cup grated coconut,few curry leaves,2 tbsp oil,½ cp yogurt,3 red chillies
recipe: In a bowl add grated coconut, mustard seeds, make a paste in a blender.
In this add salt, green chilly, red chilly powder, chopped coriander, tomatoes, mix all of together and add yogurt mix it.
Heat oil in a pan add red chilly, mustard seeds, hing, and curry leaves, switch off the flame.
Heat oil in a pan add red chilly, mustard seeds, hing, and curry leaves, switch off the flame.

name: kerala style tomato dal recipe
ingredients: ½cup tomatoes,1 cup dal,½ tsp turmeric,salt to taste,2 chillies,1 tbsp gur,1cup grated coconut,1 red chilli,½ tsp jeera,1 tbsp oil,½tsp mustard seeds,½ cup onions
recipe: In a pressure cooker, cook the dal with 4 glasses of water. It should be in the paste form when done.
In a vessel, take the cooked dal paste and add the tomatoes.
Add salt and turmeric powder, green chillies and allow the tomatoes to be cooked.
Meanwhile, grind the grated coconut, 3 red chillies and the cumin seeds together.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the coconut paste to the dal.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the coconut paste to the dal.
Now, in another pan, heat the oil/ghee and allow mustard seeds to splutter and after that, add the curry leaves and a chopped red chilli into it.
Add the chopped baby onions and saute them till golden brown.

name: tomato kurma recipe
ingredients: ¼ cup coconut,1 tbsp putani,5 whole cashews,1 tsp coriander seeds,2 green chilli,1 tsp mustard seeds,½ inch dalchini,few curry leaves,1 medium onion,3 large tomato,½ tsp turmeric,2 tbsp coriander leaves
recipe: firstly, prepare the masala by grinding all the ingredients listed for masala paste.
now heat the oil and add in 1 tsp mustard seeds, ½ tsp urad dal, ½ inch cinnamon stick and few curry leaves.
saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
furthermore, add in ½ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp red chilli powder, ½ tsp sugar and salt to taste.
now add in prepared masala paste and 1 cup water.
further, cover and simmer for 15 minutes or more till the coconut gets cooked well.
further, cover and simmer for 15 minutes or more till the coconut gets cooked well.

name: tomato rasam
ingredients: ⅓ cup coriander stems,7-8 garlic cloves,1 inch ginger,2 tsp cumin seeds,2 tsp cumin seeds,¼  tsp black peppercorns,1 tbsp oil,½ tsp mustard seeds,½ tsp urad dal,1-2 dry red chillies,1 pinch asafoetida,10-12 curry leaves,¼ tsp turmeric powder,1.5 cups water,2 tbsp coriander leaves
recipe: In a heavy pan or pot, heat the oil. Keep the flame to its lowest.
Add the mustard seed and let them begin to crackle.
When the mustard seeds start to crackle, then add urad dal.
Stirring often fry urad dal until they turn golden.
Stirring often fry urad dal until they turn golden.
Stirring often fry urad dal until they turn golden.,
Add the coarsely ground coriander stems+ginger+garlic mixture and curry leaves. If the pan becomes too hot, then you can switch off the heat.
Sauté for a minute on lowest flame taking care the mixture does not burn. You will get a nice aroma while sautéing this mixture.
Add turmeric powder.
Mix turmeric powder with the rest of the mixture.
Now add the tomato puree. mix very well. Take care as the mixture splutters.
Sauté for a minute. Season with salt as per taste.
Then add 1.5 cups water. If you like a little thin tomato rasam, then you could add some more water. But do not add too much water as the flavors get diluted.
Mix well and simmer thakkali rasam on mediumlow heat until the rasam comes to a simmer.
Finally switch off the heat and add 2  tbsp chopped coriander leaves. Check the taste of tomato rasam and add more salt if needed.

name: tomato rice
ingredients: 1 cup chopped tomatoes,⅓ cup onions,1 inch ginger,½  tsp chopped green chilli,½  tsp mustard seeds,2 green cardamoms,¼  tsp turmeric powder,½ tsp red chilli powder,½ tsp black pepper powder,1  tsp cumin powder,½ tbsp mint leaves,¼ cup coriander leaves,water as required,2 tbsp oil
recipe: Rinse basmati rice or any regular rice for a couple of times in water.
Then soak the rice in water for 20 to 30 minutes. Later drain the rice and keep aside.
Chop the tomatoes, onions and green chillies finely. Peel and crush the gingergarlic in a mortar pestle. Also, chop the mint and coriander leaves
Add the soaked rice. Gently mix the rice with the tomato mixture very well. Sauté for a minute.
Add 1.75 cups water. For a more softer consistency in the rice, you can also add 2 cups water.
Season with salt as per taste.
Season with salt as per taste.
When the pressure settles down on its own. Then remove the lid and gently fluff the tomato rice.

name: tomato chutney
ingredients: 2 large tomatoes,½ inch ginger ,½ inch ginger ,½ inch ginger ,4 to 5 black pepper,2 to 3 cloves,1 pinch asafoetida,2 tbsp water for grinding,½ tbsp oil
recipe: Heat oil and add urad dal. On a low flame, saute the urad dal till they start turning maroonish.
Once the lentils get a maroonish brown color, add broken dry red chillies, cloves, black pepper and ginger. Stir for till the red chillies change their color.
Then add chopped tomatoes and asafoetida. Add salt.
Stir and saute till the tomatoes soften. About 6 to 7 minutes on a low flame.
Once the tomato mixture cools, add them to a chutney grinder or small blender.
Add 2 tbsp water and grind to a smooth paste.

name: tomato soup
ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes,1 can chicken broth,2 tbsp butter,2 tbsp white sugar,1 tbsp chopped onion,¼ tsp baking soda
recipe: Heat butter until it melts in a saucepan or a pot. Keep the heat to low or mediumlow.
Add bay leaves and sauté for a few seconds. Add chopped onions and garlic. Stir and sauté until onions soften for about 3 to 4 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and salt. Mix well.
Cover pan and simmer on a low to mediumlow heat until tomatoes soften or for about 8 to 10 minutes.
There is no need to add water. But do keep an eye when the tomatoes are simmering. If the liquids dry up then add a splash of water and continue cooking.
After the tomatoes have softened, remove from the heat and cool. Take out the bay leaves and discard.

name: creamy tomata macaroni soup
ingredients: 4 Tomatoes,1 big Carrot,1 big Onion,1 tbsp Chopped garlic,1/4 cup Macaroni,For White Sauce,1.5 tbsp Butter,1 heaped tbsp Plain flour,1 heaped tbsp Plain flour,1 tbsp Oil ,½ tsp Whole black pepper
recipe: Cook macaroni as per pkg instructions and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped onion and garlic. Cook till it softens, no need to brown.
Add tomatoes and carrots. Give a stir, add pepper and salt. Add 2.5 cups water. Bring it to boil.
Reduce flame to lowest, cook till tomatoes and carrots are done.
Reduce flame to lowest, cook till tomatoes and carrots are done.
Grind the cooked veggies to a smooth paste with 1/4 cup water.
To make white sauce: Melt butter in a wide pan. Add flour to this and cook till the raw smell goes, around 35 mins.
Add the milk gradually and make a thick and smooth sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
Combine the ground paste and stock and bring back to fire. Cook for 34 mins.
Add white sauce and cooked macaroni and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from gas.

name: tomato ketchup sauce
ingredients: 2 cans tomatoes,½ cup water,¾ cup distilled vinegar,1 tsp onion powder,½ tsp garlic powder,⅛ tsp celery salt,¼ tsp black pepper
recipe: Pour ground tomatoes into slow cooker. Swirl 1/4 cup water in each emptied can and pour into slow cooker. Add sugar, vinegar, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, celery salt, mustard powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and whole clove; whisk to combine.
Cook on high, uncovered, until mixture is reduced by half and very thick, 10 to 12 hours. Stir every hour or so.
Ladle the ketchup into a fine strainer and press mixture with the back of a ladle to strain out any skins and seeds.
Transfer the strained ketchup to a bowl. Cool completely before tasting to adjust salt, black pepper, or cayenne pepper.

name: Crispy Cucumbers and tomatoes in Dill
ingredients: ¼ cup cider vinegar,1  tsp white sugar,½  tsp salt,½  tsp chopped fresh dill weed,¼  tsp ground black pepper,2  tbsp vegetable oil,2 cucumbers,2 ripe tomatoes
recipe: In a large bowl, mix the vinegar, sugar, salt, dill, pepper, and oil. Add cucumbers, onion, and tomatoes. Toss, and let stand at least 15 minutes before serving.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Crispy Cucumbers and tomatoes in Dill.jpg

name: cucumber cooler
ingredients: 2 cucumbers  peeled, seeded and chopped,⅜ cup fresh lime juice,⅓ cup white sugar,⅔ cup water
recipe: Combine the cucumber, lime juice, sugar, and water in a food processor; puree.n

name: Cucumber Curry
ingredients: Cucumber peeled 3 large,Ginger 1 inch piece,Dried red chillies 12,Oil 2  tbsp,Tomato 1 medium,Cumin powder ½  tsp,Red chilli powder 1/4  tsp,Coconut milk 2  tbsp,coriander leaves a few sprigs,Fresh red chilli slit 1
recipe: Grind ginger, garlic, black peppercorns, dried red chillies and peanuts with a little water to a paste.
Grind ginger, garlic, black peppercorns, dried red chillies and peanuts with a little water to a paste.
Add onions to the pan and saute till soft. Chop tomato and add to the pan and saute.

Add cucumber, salt and mix well. Add turmeric powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder and saute for 23 minutes. Add peanut paste, coconut milk and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat for 10 minutes.
Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a fresh coriander sprig and fresh red chilli and serve hot with chapatti.

name: Cucumber Soup
ingredients: 1 tbsp butter,1 tbsp olive oil,1 small yellow onion,1 large clove garlic,2 large cucumbers,2 small zucchinis,3 cups vegetable broth
recipe: Melt butter with the oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in the butter mixture until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add cucumber and zucchini slices; cook and stir until softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Pour vegetable broth over the mixture; bring to a boil, reduce heat to mediumlow, and let simmer until the vegetables are cooked through, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from heat and cool a few minutes.
Pour soup into a blender no more than half full. Cover and hold lid in place with a towel; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend. Puree in batches until smooth.

name: Greek Zoodle Salad
ingredients: 2 zucchini,¼ cucumber,10 cherry tomatoes,10 kalamata olives ,¼ cup red onion,2 ounces feta cheese,2 tbsp lemon juice,1 tsp dried oregano
recipe: Cut zucchini into noodleshaped strands using a spiralizing tool. Place zoodles in a large bowl and top with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, red onion, and feta cheese.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; pour over zoodle mixture and toss to coat. Marinate salad in refrigerator for 10 to 15 minutes.

name: Cheera parippu thoran
ingredients: Spinach 1 cup,Parippu ½ cups,turmeric powder ½ tsp,1 onion,½ cup Scraped Coconut,2 Green chilly,1 sprig of curry leaves
recipe: Soak the cheera in water with little salt for some time and rinse and drain
Take parippu and cook in a pan with just enough water and cover and cook on slow fire
Chop the onions finely into squares, cut the chillies round
Heat another pan, pour oil and pop mustards, then add the chopped onion, green chillies and curry leaves
Once they are limp, add turmeric powder and then the scraped coconut
Chop the spinach finely and keep aside
Fry the coconut for a few minutes till they are slightly dry
Add salt, mix well and then add the chopped Spinach
Stir fry on high flame for one full minute or more till you can see the leaves curl up
Add the cooked parippu and mix well

name: Cheera thoran
ingredients: 1½ cups red lentils,½ tsp salt,½ tsp ground turmeric,½  tsp chilli powder,1 pound spinach, rinsed and chopped,1  tsp ground cumin,1  tsp garam masala,½ cup coconut milk
recipe: In a large saucepan, bring water to a boil and stir in salt, lentils, turmeric and chilli powder. Cover and return to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes. Stir in the spinach and cook 5 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Add more water if necessary.

In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter and saute onions with cumin and mustard seeds, stirring often. Cook until onions are transparent, and then combine with lentils. Stir in garam masala and coconut milk and cook until heated through.

name: Sweet & Spicy Chicken Wraps
ingredients: ½ cup mayonnaise,1 cucumber,1 tbsp honey,ground black pepper,1½ pounds chicken breast,½ tsp cayenne pepper,1 bag baby spinach leaves
recipe: Mix together the mayonnaise, cucumber, 1 tbsp of honey, ½  tsp of cayenne pepper, and black pepper in a bowl until smooth. Cover and refrigerate until needed.

Heat the olive oil in a skillet on mediumhigh heat, and cook and stir the chicken breast strips until they are beginning to turn golden and are no longer pink in the middle, about 8 minutes. Stir in the salsa, 1 tbsp of honey, and ½  tsp of cayenne pepper. Reduce the heat to mediumlow and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the flavors have blended, about 5 minutes.
Stack the tortillas, 4 at a time, in a microwave oven and heat until warm and pliable, 20 to 30 seconds per batch.
Spread each tortilla with 1 tbsp of the mayonnaisecucumber mixture, top with a layer of baby spinach leaves, and arrange about ½ cup of chicken mixture on the spinach leaves.

Fold the bottom of each tortilla up about 2 inches, and start rolling the burrito from the right side. When the burrito is halfrolled, fold the top of the tortilla down, enclosing the filling, and continue rolling to make a tight, compact cylinder.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Simple Sweet and Spicy Chicken Wraps.jpg

name: Roasted Egg Mash
ingredients: egg,3 large garlic cloves,1.5 tbsp oil I used vegetable oil,4 large garlic cloves chopped,1 inch ginger chopped,1 medium red onion 120 grams
recipe: Scrample the eggs. Brush it with little oil all over. Then make few slits all over the brinjal with a knife. In 3 of those slits, insert a large clove of garlic. Put the brinjal directly on heat and roast, turning often for around 1012 minutes until completely roasted.
Once roasted (to check if its done, insert a knife inside the brinjal, it should go easily) use a pair of tongs to remove the brinjal from heat and wrap in an aluminium foil to cool.
Once cooled, remove the skin. Meanwhile also chop the roasted garlic.

Heat oil in a pan on medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add chopped garlic (different from the ones used while roasting the brinjal), ginger and green chilli. Saute until they start changing color, around 2 minutes.
Then add in the chopped onion and cook for 23 minutes until softened. Don't brown them.
Add the chopped tomatoes and mix. Cook the tomatoes for around 5 minutes until very soft and you notice oil oozing out of the masala.
Add the mashed roasted brinjal into the pan along with the chopped roasted garlic and mix well.
Add the red chilli powder and mix. Also add the coriander powder and salt and mix to combine. Cook the bharta for another 5 minutes on mediumlow heat, stirring often.
Stir in the chopped cilantro and mix. Remove pan from heat.
Serve baingan bharta hot with fresh rotis!

name: Creamy Coconut brinjal Curry
ingredients: 1 kg extrafirm tofu,2 cans coconut milk,2 tbsp Thai red curry paste,1 medium brinjal ,1 large onion chopped,1 medium red bell pepper,2 tbsp dark brown sugar,1 tbsp tamari,1 tbsp rice vinegar,1 tsp salt
recipe: Wrap tofu in several layers of paper towels. Place in a colander in the sink. Set a plate on top of tofu and weigh down with a large, heavy can. Let stand for at least 20 minutes.

Meanwhile, shake cans of coconut milk well prior to opening. Pour ½ of 1 can into a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Whisk in curry paste until well blended. Add brinjal, onion, and bell pepper, stirring well with a rubber spatula to prevent breaking of tender brinjal during cooking.

Stir remaining 1 ½ cans coconut milk, dark brown sugar, tamari, rice vinegar, and salt into the saucepan. Mix well. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until thickened, about 20 minutes.
Unwrap tofu and cut into bitesized cubes. Stir into curry mixture. Cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Add peas and cook until warm, 1 to 2 minutes more.

name: brinjal and Tomato Pie
ingredients: 9 inch pie crust,4 tomatoes,½ cup basil,3 green onions,½ pound bacon,½ tsp garlic powder,1 tsp oregano,½  tsp crushed red pepper,2 cup cheese,¼ cup mayonnaise
recipe: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

In alternating layers, fill pastry shell with tomatoes, basil, scallions, bacon, garlic powder, oregano, and red pepper. In a small bowl, mix cheese with mayonnaise. Spread mixture over top of pie. Cover loosely with aluminum foil.
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Remove foil from top of pie and bake an additional 30 minutes. Serve warm or cold.

name: Brinjal Curry With Potatoes
ingredients: 1 brinjal,2  tbsp vegetable oil,½  tsp cumin seeds,1 medium onion,1  tsp chopped fresh ginger,1 large tomato  peeled,1 clove garlic,½  tsp ground turmeric,½  tsp ground cumin,½  tsp ground coriander,¼  tsp cayenne pepper,ground black pepper to taste,¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro
recipe: Preheat the oven's broiler. Rub oil on the outside of the egg plant, or coat with cooking spray. Place under the broiler, and cook until the flesh is soft and the skin is blistering off, about 30 minutes. Turn as needed for even cooking. Cut the brinjal in half lengthwise, and scoop the flesh out of the skin. Discard the skin; chop up the flesh, and set aside.

Heat the oil in a large skillet or wok over mediumhigh heat. Add the cumin seeds, and let them crackle for a few seconds and turn golden brown. Be careful not to burn them. Add the onion, ginger and garlic; cook and stir until tender. I don't let the onions get very brown. Stir in the tomato, and season with turmeric, ground cumin, ground coriander, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes.
Place the brinjal pieces in the skillet, and cook for 10 to 15 minutes so some of the moisture evaporates. Taste, and adjust seasonings if desired. Garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve.

name: Roasted sesame-garlic brinjal
ingredients: 1 bulb garlic,1 tbsp olive oil, ¼ cup finely chopped onion, 6 cups chicken broth,¾ cup tomato puree,1 dash cayenne pepper,1 ¼ cups halfandhalf,1  tsp Worcestershire sauce
recipe: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with foil.

Peel away any excess paper from the bulb of garlic, then cut the top off to expose the cloves. Rub exposed cloves with 1/4  tsp olive oil, and set onto the prepared baking sheet. Poke the brinjal all over with a fork; place onto baking sheet.

Bake in preheated oven until the garlic has turned golden brown and the brinjal is tender, 30 to 40 minutes. Allow to cool until cool enough to handle. Peel brinjal and chop into large chunks; peel or squeeze the roasted garlic from its skin, and set aside.

Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in onion, and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Pour in chicken broth, then stir in reserved brinjal, roasted garlic, tomato puree, and cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil over mediumhigh heat, then reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer for 40 minutes.

Once cooked, carefully puree soup in batches in a blender or food processor until smooth. Return soup to the stove in a clean saucepan. Stir in halfandhalf, season to taste with salt and pepper; cook over mediumlow heat until hot.

name: Sauteed brinjal
ingredients: 1 medium brinjal,2 tbsp balsamic vinaigrette,salt,ground black pepper,nonstick cooking spray,1 tbsp chopped onion, 2 cloves garlic chopped
recipe: Cut brinjal into thin slices. Drizzle slices on one side with 1 tbsp balsamic vinaigrette and season with salt and pepper.

Spray a large saucepan with nonstick spray and heat over low heat. Place brinjal in the pan, seasonedsides down, in a single layer. Drizzle refining vinaigrette over the exposed sides. Add onion and garlic. Cover and cook until brinjal slices are lightly browned and tender, about 5 minutes per side.

name: Avocado Milkshake
ingredients: 1 large Ripe Avocado,2 cups Milk or Almond Milk,3 tablespoons Sugar
recipe: Choose ripe avocado by pressing it gently; if it is hard, it means Avocado is unripe; if it’s too soft then it means Avocado is overripe; if it is soft yet little firm, then it means Avocado is ready. Cut it into half and remove the pit.
Scoop the pulp out using a spoon and place it into a blender jar. Add milk and sugar.
Blend until smooth texture. Taste it for sugar at this stage and add more sugar if desired.

name: avocado salad
ingredients: 1.25 kg avocado,½ cup green onion,2 tbsp lemon juice,½ tsp salt,Ground black pepper
recipe: Cut each fruit in half and remove the pit
Then cut each half into 2-3 strips
In a large salad bowl add all ingredients
Stir gently with a wooden spoon and consume within next 5-6 hours

name: Green Gram Salad
ingredients: ½ cup chopped onion,½ cup chopped green bell pepper,2 pkgs mixed salad greens,4 thinly sliced chicken,1 tomato,¼  tsp onion powder,3 dashes garlic powder,1 pinch ground black pepper,2 pinches salt,3 tbsp balsamic vinaigrette
recipe: Microwave or saute onion and bell pepper until soft; set aside to cool.
In a large salad bowl, combine the onion, pepper, salad greens, deli meat and tomato. Sprinkle with the onion powder, garlic powder, black pepper and salt. Toss to mix.
Pour on enough salad dressing or vinegar to coat, toss again and serve.

name: Guilt Free Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ½ Kg chicken boneless,3 tbsp taco seasoning,3 Lemons,2 tbsp garlic,1 tbsp oil,Cabbage/Lettuce,1 packet tortilla chips
recipe: Take a crisp lettuce cup, put the cooked chicken in it first. Then add a dollop of salsa followed by a dollop of Mexican yoghurt dip. Don't put the dip first, it will make the lettuce soggy.
If you don't want to eat lettuce, you can put the cooked taco chicken on tortilla chips, and add a touch of dip and salsa and serve as finger food.
If you buy a ready made tortilla packet from the market, do not reheat them on high heat, they will turn brittle if you overcook them. Just cook them on low heat.

name: Lettuce Wrapped Cottage Cheese
ingredients: 2 lettuce leaves,1/4 cup cottage cheese,½ yellow bell pepper,½ red bell pepper ,½ tbsp chilli sauce,½ tsp green pepper corns,½ tsp pink pepper corns,2 tsp chopped chives,½ tsp crushed peanut,½ tsp roasted garlic
recipe: In a bowl, mix cottage cheese, red and yellow peppers, Thai chilli sauce, roasted garlic, crushed peanut, pepper corns and chopped chives.
Spread the mixture on the lettuce leaf and wrap.
Tie with the chive and serve.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

name: Pork Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1½ pounds pork,1 zucchini,½ cup carrots,2 tbsp sesame oil,¼ cup hoisin sauce,1 tbsp minced garlic,2 tsp ginger paste,2 tsp sriracha sauce,¼ tsp red pepper flakes,1 lettuce
recipe: Whisk together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, fish sauce, garlic, lemongrass, ginger, sriracha, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
Drizzle oil into a large skillet over mediumhigh heat.
Add pork and brown, breaking apart with a spoon or spatula as it cooks, for about 5 minutes.
Add zucchini, water chestnuts, onions, and carrots. Sauté about 57 minutes until veggies are tender.
Serve in lettuce cups and garnish with green onions if desired.

name: Roasted asparagus & smashed new potato salad
ingredients: 3½ pounds potatoes,⅓ cup kosher salt,black pepper to taste,1 pinch cayenne pepper
recipe: Place potatoes into a 5quart stockpot and cover with 3 quarts of cold water. Add kosher salt and bring to a simmer over high heat. Reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer gently until potatoes are just tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from heat and drain well. Let potatoes cool just until they're safe to handle.

Transfer potatoes onto a sheet pan and continue cooling to room temperature. Make 4 or 5 shallow cuts down the sides of each potato, about every inch or so, to ensure the skin splits evenly when smashed. Refrigerate until completely chilled and ready to smash; 8 hours to overnight is best.

Combine butter, sliced garlic, rosemary, and thyme in a small pan over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until butter melts and begins to bubble, and garlic softens and starts to turn translucent, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat.
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (232 degrees C). Line 2 metal baking sheets with silicone baking mats (such as Silpat®) and generously brush on some of the infused melted butter.

Remove potatoes from the fridge and gently smash each between two pieces of plastic using a flat, heavy object until ½ to 3/4inch thick. Season generously with salt, pepper, and cayenne on both sides, being careful not to break potatoes up into small pieces. Transfer onto a sheet pan, being careful not to overlap potatoes. Very generously drizzle and brush most of the melted butter on top.
Bake potatoes in the preheated oven until well browned and crunchy around the edges, 35 to 45 minutes.

Meanwhile, place the pan with the remaining garlic and herb butter back over mediumlow heat. Cook, stirring, until garlic starts to turn a very light golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from heat and reserve.
Carefully transfer potatoes onto a serving platter and scatter over the golden brown slices of garlic. Crumble the toasted herbs on top if desired. Serve immediately.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Roasted asparagus _ smashed new potato salad.jpg

name: Simple Butter Lettuce Salad
ingredients: 2 heads lettuce,castelvetrano olives,butter,chives,manchego cheese,freshly ground pepper
recipe: In small bowl whisk together ingredients for the dressing, set aside.
In a small skillet set over medium heat, melt butter and add panko. Stir often until panko is golden brown in color.
Arrange butter lettuce on a large platter, shave manchego over lettuce and add olives, panko and chives. Drizzle with dressing right before serving and enjoy!

name: Teriyaki beef & lettuce cups
ingredients: 350g trimmed sirloin steak,2 tbsp teriyaki sauce marinade,1⁄2 cucumber,2 tbsp coriander,juice 1⁄2 lime,6 Little Gem lettuces leaves,6 Little Gem lettuces leaves,1⁄2 red onion
recipe: Put the steak between two sheets of cling film and beat with a rolling pin until half its original thickness. Thinly slice the steak, then mix with the teriyaki marinade in a bowl. Leave to marinate for 510 mins.
Roughly dice the cucumber and mix with the chopped coriander and lime juice. Season with a little salt.
Heat a frying pan until very hot, then fry the steak slices for 1½2½ mins for rare to medium, turning the slices halfway through.
Pile the cucumber mixture into the lettuce leaves, then top with the seared teriyaki beef, chilli and red onion.

name: Tomato-Cucumber Sandwich
ingredients: 1 tomato cut into thin slices,Few slices of bread ,1 cucumber peeled & cut into thin slices,few lettuce leaves ,Butter,Green chutney,Tomato Ketchup,Hot chilli sauce ,Chaat masala
recipe: Take your bread slices & apply some butter on it followed by green chutney to one side.
Now place your lettuce on the slice to which green chutney is applied. Chutney will act as glue & help to hold the lettuce. Add as many or little as you like.
Top it with two slices of tomato. Season the tomato well with salt & pepper.
Now place cucumber slices all over the tomato. Sprinkle some chaat masala on the cucumber. If you don't have chaat masala just sprinkle salt & pepper to taste.
Now take the other slice & apply a combination of tomato ketchup & hot chilli sauce & Close the sandwich.

name: Tuna, avocado & pea salad
ingredients: 1½ tbsp lowfat yogurt,85g canned tuna chunks,50g cooked rice,85g frozen pea,½ red pepper,1 avocado,1 lime,1 pack coriander,1 lettuce
recipe: Combine all the ingredients except the lettuce in a bowl, season, then chill until ready to eat. Spoon the tuna mix on top of the lettuce leaves, wrap up and enjoy.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Tuna, avocado _ pea salad in Baby Gem lettuce wraps.jpg

name: Cheese Noodles
ingredients: 8ounces spaghetti,4ounces cream cheese cut into cubes,½ cup reserved pasta water,1/4  tsp garlic powder,pepper
recipe: In a large pot, cook the pasta in salted water according to the pkg instructions. Before draining, dip out ½ cup of pasta water and set aside. Drain the pasta and set aside.

Return the pasta pot to the heat over medium low and add the reserved pasta water and the cubed cream cheese. Whisk together until the cream cheese has melted and the sauce is smooth. Add the garlic powder. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Add the pasta back to the pot and toss to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Gralic Chicken Fried Brown Rice
ingredients: 2  tbsp vegetable oil,8 ounces skinless,½ red bell pepper,½ cup green onion,4 cloves garlic,3 cups cooked brown rice,2  tbsp light soy sauce,1 tbsp rice vinegar,1 cup frozen peas
recipe: Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. Add the chicken, bell pepper, green onion and garlic. Cook and stir until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken to a plate and keep warm.

Heat the remaining tbsp of oil in the same skillet over mediumhigh heat. Add the rice; cook and stir to heat through. Stir in the soy sauce, rice vinegar and peas, and continue to cook for 1 minute. Return the chicken mixture to the skillet and stir to blend with the rice and heat through before serving.

name: GREEN PEAS CURRY WITH COCONUT
ingredients: ½ cup water,½ cup coconut milk,½ cup coconut milk,½  tsp butter,3 ounces firm tofu,1 cup fresh green beans,1 cup fresh green beans,¼ cup coconut milk
recipe: Pour water, ½ cup coconut milk, and rice into a small saucepan. Bring to a boil over mediumhigh heat, then reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.

Meanwhile, melt the butter in a skillet over mediumhigh heat. Add the tofu and cook until goldenbrown on all sides, about 5 minutes. When browned, stir in green beans, curry powder, and 1/4 cup of coconut milk. Simmer until the green beans are tender, then serve over rice.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/KERALA STYLE GREEN PEAS CURRY WITH COCONUT.jpg

name: Matar Makhana Curry
ingredients: cup tomatoes chopped,1/4 cup cashew kaju,1 Tbsp ginger chopped,½ tsp cumin seeds jeera,2 tsp coriander powder,½ tsp red chilli powder,1 tsp sugar,1/4 cup cilantro
recipe: Heat 3 tbsp of oil in frying pan over low medium heat, add the makhana and roast them stirring continuously until they are crisp, this should take about 34 minutes. Keep aside.
Blend tomatoes, cashews and ginger to make a pure.

Heat the oil in a sauce pan, test the heat by adding one cumin seed. If the seed cracks right away, the oil is ready. Add asafetida and cumin seeds, as the cumin seeds crack add tomato paste, coriander, chilli powder, salt and sugar.

Stirfry for two to three minutes, until the oil begins to separate from the mixture. Add roasted makhana and green peas mix it well add about 1½ cups of water. Cover the pan and let it cook for 67 minutes over low medium heat, until peas are tender. Note: add more water if you like more gravy.
Turn off the heat add garam masala and cilantro mix it well.

name: Matar Paneer
ingredients: 3  tbsp oil or ghee,½  tsp cumin seeds,¼  tsp turmeric powder,¼  tsp Garam Masala Powder ,1 tbsp cream,1 cup green peas,½  tsp sugar,½  tsp kasuri methi ,½  tsp kasuri methi,1  tsp chopped green chillies ,1  tsp chopped garlic,2  tbsp chopped coriander leaves
recipe: In a grinder or blender take all the ingredients listed under masala paste – onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, green chillies, cashews, coriander leaves, black peppercorns, cinnamon, cardamom, coriander seeds and cloves.
Grind all the ingredients to a smooth paste. If needed you can add 2 to 3  tbsp of water while blending.
There should be no small chunks or pieces of cashews in the paste.
Set the ground paste aside.

name: Methi Matar malai
ingredients: 1 medium onion,¼ cup cashews,1 tsp cumin seeds,1 tsp chopped garlic,1 tsp chopped ginger,1-2 green chillies
recipe: In a grinder jar or blender, add cumin seeds, chopped onions, cashews, garlic, ginger and green chillies.
Blend or grind to a smooth paste withput adding any water.
If you are not able to blend, then you can add 1 to 2  tbsp of water.

For cooking the green peas, you can either boil them in a pan with 1.5 cups water for 7 to 8 minutes until tender or steam them in an Instant pot for 3 to 5 minutes adding about 1 to 1.25 cups water in the steel insert.
You can also boil the green peas in a stovetop pressure cooker for 5 to 6 minutes. Reserve ½ cup of the cooked water if you have boiled the peas.

name: pav bhaji
ingredients: 3 potatoes ,1 to 1.25 cups chopped cauliflower,1 cup chopped carrot,1 cup green peas,⅓ cup chopped french beans, 2.25 to 2.5 cups water
recipe: Rinse, peel and chop the veggies. You will need 1 cup chopped cauliflower, 1 cup chopped carrot, 3 medium sized potatoes (chopped) and ⅓ cup chopped french beans. You can also add veggies of your choice.
Add all the above chopped veggies in a 2 litre pressure cooker. Also add 1 cup green peas (fresh or frozen).
Add all the above chopped veggies in a 2 litre pressure cooker. Also add 1 cup green peas (fresh or frozen).
When the pressure settles down on its own, open the cooker and check if the veggies are cooked well. You can even steam or cook the veggies in a pan. The vegetables have be to cooked completely.

name: split peas soup
ingredients: 2¼ cups dried split peas,2 quarts cold water,1 ½ pounds ham bone,2 onions,½  tsp salt,¼  tsp ground black pepper,3 stalks celery,3 carrots,1 potato
recipe: In a large stock pot, cover peas with 2 quarts cold water and soak overnight. If you need a faster method, simmer the peas gently for 2 minutes, and then soak for l hour.
Once peas are soaked, add ham bone, onion, salt, pepper and marjoram. Cover, bring to boil and then simmer for 1 ½ hours, stirring occasionally.
Remove bone; cut off meat, dice and return meat to soup. Add celery, carrots and potatoes. Cook slowly, uncovered for 30 to 40 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.

name: Baby Potato Recipe With Green Peas
ingredients: olive oil cooking spray,1 pound baby red potatoes,1 pound fresh green beans trimmed,1  tsp salt,1  tsp garlic powder,½  tsp ground black pepper,½  tsp dried parsley
recipe: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray.

Cut potatoes in half if they are golfballsized or larger. Lay potatoes and green beans in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet and spray with cooking spray. Sprinkle salt, garlic powder, pepper, and parsley on top.
Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender, 25 to 30 minutes.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Baby Potato Recipe With Green Peas.jpg

name: Beef Stew
ingredients: 1½ pounds cubed beef stew meat,2  tbsp vegetable oil,1 onion,¼ cup allpurpose flour,4 cups diced potatoes,2 cups diced carrots,2  tbsp cornstarch
recipe: Using a large stock pot, brown stewing meat in oil. Add onions and sprinkle flour into stock pot, stirring until flour is well incorporated.

Fill stock pot with water. If you prefer a thick stew fill stock pot only half full, if you prefer a more diluted stew fill your stock pot within one inch of the top. Let meat cook until tender, checking frequently on water level. When water evaporates add more. Cook for 1 ½ hours.
When beef is tender add potatoes, carrots and beefy mushroom soup. Cook for 30 to 45 minutes, or until tender.

In a separate bowl mix cornstarch and cold water. Stir into soup and simmer. If not to desired thickness add another mixture of cornstarch and cold water. Heat through, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Grilled Baked Potatoes
ingredients: 4 large baking potatoes quartered,2  tbsp olive oil,2  tsp freshly ground black pepper,2  tsp garlic powder,2  tsp dried rosemary
recipe: Place the potatoes into a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook over mediumhigh heat for about 10 minutes, or until tender.
Preheat the grill to mediumhigh heat. Drain potatoes and toss with olive oil, black pepper, rosemary and salt to taste.
Place the potatoes skinside down over indirect heat on the grill and reserve liquid. Grill for about 15 minutes. Remove potatoes to a serving plate and sprinkle with the reserved olive oil mixture.

name: Kerala Style Duck Curry with Potatoes
ingredients: 2 Duck,1 Onion,Curry Leaves,6tbsp Coriander Powder,1tsp Turmeric,2 Potato peeled and diced
recipe: Heat some Oil in a pan and saute Onion and Curry Leaves until Onion is golden brown in color.
Add Ginger and Garlic, saute for few mins or until raw smell is gone.
Saute until Masala is deep dark brown in color or until raw smell of Masala is gone.
Add washed and sliced Duck peices and Salt.
Mix everything well and cover the pan using a tight lid and allow Duck to cook.
Don’t forget to stir Duck Curry occassionally.
When Duck is fully cooked add Potatoes.
Remove excess fat from Duck Curry.
When Duck and Potatoes are fully cooked add Garam Masala and Black Pepper.
Serve Kerala Style Duck Curry with Potatoes, with Rice or Bread.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/Kerala Style Duck Curry with Potatoes.jpg

name: Nadan urulakizhangu mezhukkupuratti
ingredients: 3 nos Potato,2 nos Crushed garlic clove,½ tsp Chilly powder,1/4 tsp Turmeric powder,2 sprigs Curry leaves,2 sprigs Curry leaves
recipe: Peel the potatoes, wash well and cut into small pieces.
Heat coconut oil in a pan add crushed shallots,garlic and curry leaves saute until translucent.
Now add chilly powder,turmeric powder and salt stir till the raw smell goes then add potatoes and saute for 3to4 minutes.
Then close the pan with lid and cook in low flame until it is done(stir occasionally).
Open the lid and roast until light brown.

name: Sambar
ingredients: 1 cup yellow split peas (tuvar dal),2 cups water½ cup tamarind pulp,½ cup water,1 green bell pepper sliced,1 tomato,1  tsp yellow lentils (chana dal),2 dried red chile peppers,2  tsp vegetable oil,1  tsp mustard seed,1  tsp cumin seed
recipe: Place yellow split peas in a saucepan with 2 cups water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to mediumlow, and cook until soft, about 15 minutes. In another saucepan, mix together the tamarind pulp stir in ½ cup water to make a watery juice. Bring to a boil over mediumhigh heat. Add the bell pepper and tomato to the tamarind juice, and continue to boil until the vegetables are soft, and the liquid has reduced to almost half.

Meanwhile, grind the coriander seeds, yellow lentils, coconut and chillies to a paste using a mortar and pestle or food processor. Add this paste to the tamarind sauce, then stir in the yellow lentils until everything is well blended. Bring to a boil once again, then remove from the heat and set aside.

Heat oil in a small skillet over medium heat, and add the mustard seed, cumin seed, and asafoetida powder. Once the mustard seeds start to sputter and the mixture is fragrant, remove from heat and stir into sambar. Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Stew
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,2 potatoes,2 onions,1 tbsp cumin seeds,1 tbsp mustard seed,1 medium head garlic,4 large red bell peppers,1 cinnamon stick,1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes,1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans,salt and pepper to taste,⅔ cup cooked white rice
recipe: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Cover two baking sheets with aluminum foil, and drizzle with olive oil. Arrange potatoes, carrots and onions on one baking sheet. Drizzle with more olive oil and sprinkle with oregano, cumin and mustard seeds. Place the garlic bulb on the baking sheet. Arrange the peppers and tomatoes on the second baking sheet, and sprinkle with olive oil.

Place both pans in the oven. Cook, stirring the contents occasionally, until the potatoes, carrots and onions are tender and the peppers and tomatoes are black, about 30 to 45 minutes. The bell peppers and tomatoes may take a little longer to cook than the potatoes, carrots, onions, and garlic. Feel free to remove the baking sheet of potatoes earlier than the baking sheet of bell peppers. Reduce the oven's heat to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C).

Skin and seed the peppers and skin the tomatoes. Chop the peppers and tomatoes and place them into a medium size pot that can be placed in the oven. Squeeze the garlic from skins into the pot and stir in the potato mixture and chickpeas. Season with lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.
Cover the stew, and bake it for 30 minutes.

name: congee rice porridge with spinach
ingredients: 1½ cups red lentils,½tsp ground turmeric,½tsp chilli powder,1 tsp ground cumin,½ cup coconut milk,water to boil,salt to taste
recipe: Cover and return to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes
Stir in the spinach and cook 5 minutes, or until lentils are soft
Add more water if necessary
Stir in garam masala and coconut milk and cook until heated through

name: spinach coconut soup
ingredients: 2 bunches spinach,25g butter,1 brown onion,2 garlic cloves,2 cups veg stock,½ kg cauliflower,coconut milk,½ tsp nutmeg
recipe: Rinse spinach leaves, shaking off excess water. Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add stock and cauliflower. Cover and bring to the boil. Cook for 8 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Add spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until just wilted.
Using a food processor or blender, process soup in batches, until smooth. Return soup to saucepan. Place over medium heat.
Add 1 cup coconut milk, nutmeg and cayenne pepper. Bring to gentle simmer. Ladle into cups. Drizzle with remaining coconut milk. Season with pepper. Serve with naan bread.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/creamy and delicious spinach coconut soup.jpg

name: palak paneer
ingredients: 500g Wheat Flour,50g Sooji,500g Spinach,2 Green Chillies
recipe: Prepare the dough by mixing together the flour, salt, ghee and ajwain/ carom seeds to form a mixture of coarse crumbs. Add in water to the dough a little at a time to make a soft and firm dough. Once the dough comes together knead it continuously for 23 minutes and cover it with a moist muslin cloth. Allow the dough to rest for about 1520 minutes.

name: sookhi moong palak
ingredients: 1 cup moong dal,250g spinach,1 tbsp oil,½ tsp mustard seeds,½ tsp cumin seeds,1/4 tsp asafoetida,1 dry red chili,1 cinnamon stick,ginger-garlic paste,½ tsp turmeric powder,½ cup water,salt to taste
recipe: To begin making the Sookhi Moong Palak Dal Recipe, first drain the water from the soaked green moong and keep it aside.
In a mixergrinder, add the spinach and tomatoes and puree them together. Keep this aside.
Heat the mustard oil in an iron kadhai and add the jeera seeds to it. When they start sputtering, add the onions and fry until they are soft and lightly browned.
Add the garlic, ginger and green chillies and saute for a few seconds until you can smell the aromas coming through.
imagepath: assets/jsonimages/sookhi moong palak recipe-cherupayar cheera curry.jpg

name: spinach soup recipe
ingredients: 2 cups chopped spinach,¼ cup chopped onions,¼  tsp chopped garlic,¼  tsp ground cumin (cumin powder),1 bay leaf, 1 or 1.5  tbsp olive oil or butter,2 to 3  tbsp coconut cream for topping
recipe: When the soup mixture's heat has reduced or has become warm, then blend with a hand blender or in a blender until smooth.
Remove the bay leaf while blending.
Check the seasonings and add some more salt or pepper if required.
If the soup looks thick, then add about ¼ cup water and stir.
Serve spinach soup hot sprinkled with some freshly crushed black pepper and coconut cream.

name: shredded soya roast
ingredients: 2½ cups soya chunks,2 medium sized onions,½ inch ginger,3 garlic cloves,2 green chillies,1 tbsp red chilly powder,1 tbsp coriander powder,¼ tsp turmeric powder,½ tsp black pepper powder,1 tsp + 1 tsp meat masala,1 tsp mustard seeds,2 curry leaves,¼ cup coconut bites,Oil (as required),Salt(as required),Water(as required)
recipe: Prepare soya chunks: Heat water in a pot, once it starts to boil turn off the flame and soak soya chunks in it for about 20 minutes, this helps the chunks to soften and plump. Drain the pot, squeeze out the remaining water from the chunks and place on a paper towel, keep aside.
Shred the soya: In a blender, using the pulse mode; pulse soya in batches until it forms a finely shredded form. Do not make it a paste. Alternatively, you can cut it into fine chopped pieces either.
Prepare the masala: In a wide pan (preferably nonstick), heat some oil in a medium flame and splutter mustard seeds. Add 1 sprig of curry leaves and sauté.
Followed by adding sliced onions, salt and sauté until golden. Add crushed ginger and garlic, sauté until the raw smell subsides.
Roast: Add the shredded soya, coconut bites and salt to the masala and roast it for 15 – 20 minutes until all the moisture dries out.

name: soya keema masala
ingredients: 2.5 Cups Soya Granules,Ghee,Cumin Seeds,cinnamon,cloves,green cardomom,onion,ginger paste,turmeric powder,red chilli powder
recipe: Prepare ingredients as mentioned in the list. Soak soya granules in warm water for 15 minutes, press them gently and take out excess water.

Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds, cinnamon, cloves and cardamom. When they splutter add green chillies and garlic, sauté till it turns golden brown. Then add onion and ginger paste and sauté till onions turn golden brown.

Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and gram masala powder. Sauté for a minute and then add tomato puree and stir well, cook until the oil is separates from the masala paste.

Keeping the flame on low, add well beaten dahi and stir well until the oil is separated. Add in soya granules and peas, add salt to taste and sauté for 5 minutes. Add water and MAGGI MasalaaeMagic, mix well. Cook for 5 minutes after first whistle.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with chapattis

name: soyabean dosa
ingredients: 2 cups soybeans,1 inch Ginger,4 green chillies,12 tsp rice Flour
recipe: Grind the soyabeans in a grinder, with ginger, salt and chillies to taste.
Add water and flour till you get the consistency of idliatta.
Heat a nonstick pan, pour about 2 large spoons of soya mixture. Spread with a spoon, cover and cook for 2 minutes on medium heat.

name: soyabean fry recipe
ingredients: 500 g Soya Bean chunks,2 nos Onion finely chopped,Ginger garlic paste  2 3 tsp,2 tsp Coriander powder,2 tsp Coriander powder,1/4 cup Water
recipe: Soak the Soya bean chunks for 15 mins.
Heat 2 tbsp of vegetable oil in a pressure cooker.
Add onions and saute, till they turn pink.
When it starts to boil, add the soya bean chunks and mix well.
After it cools, open the pressure cooker and if there`s any water remaining, keep on flame, till the water dries up completely.
Heat coconut oil in a heavy bottomed pan.
Add the soya bean chunks and fry, as in beef fry.
Enjoy the yummy Soya Bean fry.

name: soyabean masala
ingredients: Soya Chunks 100 g,1 onion,curry leaves,1tbsp Chilly Powder
recipe: Boil 5 cups of water. Once the water starts boiling, drop in the soya chunks and add a pinch of salt. Boil the chunks for 5 minutes and then switch off the heat and leave to rest for 15 minutes.

name: soyabean mushroom curry
ingredients: 1 cup Soya Chunks,2 tbsp Oil,8 Garlic cloves,3 Green chillies,5 Tomatoes pureed
recipe: Heat oil in a nonstick pan, add bay leaves and cumin seeds and when cuminseeds change colour, add garlic, ginger and green chillies and sauté for 23 minutes. Add onions and sauté further till the onions are lightly browned. Add tomato puree and cook for 68 minutes

Add coriander powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and salt and mix well. Cook for 2 minutes. Add mushrooms and soya chunks and mix well. Add 1 cup water and mix well.
Finely chop coriander sprigs and add to the pan and mix well. Cook till the mushrooms and soya chunks are done.

name: soyabean sukke thoran
ingredients: soyabean sukke thoran,soyabean sukke thoran,soyabean sukke thoran,1/4 tsp  urad dal,For coconut mixture:,For coconut mixture:,1/4 tsp  turmeric powder
recipe: Wash and soak soy bean in 2 cups of water for 6 hours or overnight.
Pressure cook it for 15 minutes with salt.
When they begin to crackle, add jeera and urad dal to it.
When they begin to crackle, add jeera and urad dal to it.
Add salt if needed. Cover it with a lid and cook on low to medium heat for 10  12 minutes or until it is done.
Add salt if needed. Cover it with a lid and cook on low to medium heat for 10  12 minutes or until it is done.

name: Pumkin erissery
ingredients: 2 cups pumkin,½ cup green grapkin,1 ½ tsp minced garlic,½ tsp ground turmeric,¾ cup grated coconut,½ tsp cumin seeds
recipe: Place pumkin, green gram, ground turmeric, minced garlic and enough water in a pressure cooker. Pressure cook for 56 whistles. When pressure has cooled down, open it, and lightly mash the pumpkin using a large spoon. Set aside.
Meanwhile, place grated coconut, green chillies, and cumin seeds in the bowl of a food processor. Add enough water, and process to a smooth paste. Set aside.

Transfer cooked pumpkin to a large pan. Place it over mediumhigh heat. Add ground coconut to pumpkin. Stir well. Add a little water if the mixture is too thick. Season with salt. Cover, cook, for 34 minutes. Remove from flame.

Meanwhile heat oil in a fry pan. Splutter mustard seeds. Add shallots, dried red chillies, coconut (if using) and curry leaves. Saute, stirring occasionally, until shallots turn golden brown. Remove from heat.

name: Pumpkin curry
ingredients: 5 cups pumpkin,2 cups water,1 tsp turmeric,½ cup grated coconut,3 red chilli,1 green chilli,2 tbsp water,1 tbsp coconut oil,1 tsp black lentils,6 curry leaves
recipe: Put pumpkin into a large pot. Pour 2 cups water over the pumpkin so the cubes are floating. Season pumpkin and water with turmeric and salt. Bring the mixture to a boil and cook until the pumpkin is tender yet firm enough to retain shape, about 15 minutes.

Grind ½ cup coconut, 3 red chile peppers, green chile pepper, 2  tbsp water, and cumin seeds in a food processor until you have a paste; stir into the pumpkin mixture and bring again to a boil. Cook until the liquid has thickened and coats the pumpkin cubes, 5 to 7 minutes. Pour the curry into a large serving bowl.
Heat 2  tsp coconut oil in a small skillet over mediumhigh heat. Cook 2 dried red chile peppers, mustard seeds, and black lentils in hot oil until they sputter, 2 to 3 minutes; pour over curry.
Heat remaining  tsp coconut oil in the skillet. Fry 1 tbsp coconut in the hot oil until completely browned, 3 to 5 minutes. Pour atop the curry. Garnish dish with curry leaves.

name: pumkin masala recipe
ingredients: 2 Small Pumpkin,1 cup onions,1 Ginger,1 Green chilli,2 Large Tomatoes,1 tbsp Red chilli Powder,2 tsp Garam Masala,Salt to taste
recipe: In a skillet, heat oil and add the onions.
Add the spices and saute on low heat for about 2 minutes stirring constantly.Add the jalapeno/green chilli
Add the tomato puree and continue to cook on medium heat, until the oil begins to separate from the sides (about 8 minutes)
Add the pumpkin pieces.Stir and mix well.Add salt and water.Mix well, cover and cook on medium until fully cooked (about 1015 minutes)

name: pumpkin halwa kaddu halwa
ingredients: 3 cups chopped pumpkin,½ cup sugar,3 to 4 green cardamoms,2 tbsp oil,2 tbsp mixed dry fruits, 1 cup water
recipe: Peel and chop kaddu or pumpkin into small cubes. Smaller the better.
Heat the oil or ghee in a pressure cooker.
Add the kaddu pieces in the pressure cooker
And saute till they are start releasing water or for approx 810 minutes on a low flame.
Cover and pressure cook the kaddu pieces for 45 whistles.
Open the lid when the pressure settles down
And check if the kaddu pieces have softened or not.
They should be of mashable consistency.
Once the kaddu pieces have cooked well then place the pressure cooker on fire and keep to simmer.
The consistency of the halwa should like be a pudding or pumpkin puree.
Add the melon seeds and dry fruits and cook the halwa for 12 minutes more.
Serve pumpkin halwa warm or cold.
You can also garnish it with melon seeds.

name: pumpkinsoup
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,1kg pumpkin,700ml chicken stock,150ml double cream,2 tbsp olive oil,4 slices wholemeal
recipe: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large saucepan, then gently cook 2 finely chopped onions for 5 mins, until soft but not coloured.
Add 1kg pumpkin or squash, cut into chunks, to the pan, then carry on cooking for 810 mins, stirring occasionally until it starts to soften and turn golden.
Pour 700ml vegetable or chicken stock into the pan and season with salt and pepper. Bring to the boil, then simmer for 10 mins until the squash is very soft.

Pour 150ml double cream into the pan, bring back to the boil, then purée with a hand blender. For an extravelvety consistency you can pour the soup through a fine sieve. The soup can now be frozen for up to 2 months.
Reheat the soup if needed, taste for seasoning, then serve scattered with croutons and seeds and drizzled with more olive oil, if you want.

name: ellu coconut chutney
ingredients: 1/4 cup sesame seeds,2 tbsp grated coconut,2 flakes of garlic,A marblesized ball of tamarind
recipe: The goal here is to get all the moisture out of the seeds first and roast it to a golden colour inside. This is tough to see since the seeds are very dark coloured so I have a tip below to check that
After about 34 minutes, add the red chillies and continue roasting on lowmedium flame

After about 56 minutes, take 23 sesame between your fingers and gently rub them open. The white parts inside should be a light golden brown. This means they are done. If it still looks white, continue roasting for another few minutes
